external_references.description: MSTIC, DART, M365 Defender. (2022, March 24). DEV-0537 Criminal Actor Targeting Organizations for Data Exfiltration and Destruction. Retrieved May 17, 2022.

description: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has deleted the target's systems and resources in the cloud to trigger the organization's incident and crisis response process.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)
